janathawage kamaththa matha pathwana mahajana niyojithayange adahasda prashnawalata wisandum sewimedi salakillata gatha yuthu bawa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha pawasiya.janadhipathithuma me bawa prakasha kale uthuru palath aandukara karyalaye di eeye (13) uthuru palathe siwil sanwidhana hamu wu awasthawe diya.shri lankawa pilibandawa jathyanthara prajawata sathya prakasha kirima siwil sanwidhanawala wagakimak wana bawa penwa dun janadhipathithuma emagin sanwardhanaya, sanhindiyawa ha samaya pilibandawa niwaradi thorathuru jathyantharaya wetha gena ya haki bawa da kiya.shri lankawe anekuth palath menma thrasthawadayen mudagath pradesha da ekase sanwardhanaya karana bawath esema yahapath jana jiwithayak athi kirime katayuthu sidu karana bawath sandahan kala janadhipathithuma sanwardhana katayuthu sandaha mahajana niyojithayin wetha labadena prathipadana nisi lesa bhawitha kala yuthu bawada paudgalika awashyathawayan matha sanwardhana yojana wenas nokala yuthu bawada awadharanaya kaleya.sanwardhana katayuthu sandaha laba dena mudal bhawitha nokirimen eewa nawatha eekabaddha aramudalata yomu wima janathawata karana balawath asadharanayak bawada mehidi janadhipathithuma sandahan kaleya..

parlimenthuwa wisuruwa harimata janapathi gath thiranaya niwaradi yayi adhikaranaya magin thinduwak labaduna hoth siduwanne kumakda?.mema kalaya thula wayakala mahajana mudalwalata waga kiyanne kawuda?.adhikaranaya mema thinduwa labadima pinisa metharam kalayak nogena eka digata adala pethsam wibhaga kara thinduwak kadinamin laba dunne nam mewani thaththwayak athi nowannata thibini.adhikaranaya mema thaththwaya pilibandawa salaka baliya yuthuwa thibini.aandukrama wyawasthawa rakimata gos rata aarajikawi arbuda rasak madata rata thalluwi yanne nam in palak natha.aandukrama wyawasthawen apeksha karanne rate ha janathawage suba siddhiyaya.aandukrama wyawasthawa rakinnata gos ema apeksha bhanga wanne nam eya yali yalith sakachcha kala yuthu prashnayaki.
